content.rendered:
It has been a while since we have told you all what we are up to. We have a number of news items to cover in the coming weeks, including updates to our transparency, bringing on additional staff, development of guide videos for all of our supported software applications on YouTube, work we are doing with VeraCrypt to develop a new logo, selection of members of an advisory council, and an open proposal to the Open Technology Fund (not affiliated with OSTIF) for federal grants to support our projects.

We are busy! Keep checking back with us for updates!

-Derek
